section.name: Hippo CMS Editor Tour
section.span: To get introduced to the role of CMS Editor, take the following tour.
section.p: To get introduced to the role of CMS editor, you will look over the shoulder of Janine, who works for the imaginary organization Swatia, an organization of people very interested in music, art and knowledge. We did not imagine an answer to the question whether Swatia is a commercial organization, a hobby organization, or both.
Swatia decided to publish an online newspaper about music, art and knowledge.
Janine will for example decide if articles written by contributors can be published in the Swatia newspaper.

td.a: Janine starts the Hippo CMS site of Swatia.

tr.td: Login to Hippo CMS in the CMS account given to you by your CMS administrator. Janine logs in with her name. Her password is only known to her, so you do not get to see it.
Create folder for authors to add their documents in. Janine wants all content for the Sar newspaper to be collected in one folder and she creates the 'newspaper' document folder for this.
Logout. Janine quits for this day.
A week later Janine wants to check for requests, so she opens the Hippo CMS site http://localhost:8080/cms/ in her browser.
Janine logs in a week later.
Check for requests. Janine checks for requests and she finds that there is a request from Marc to publish the document 'multibazar2009', which is of type upcoming.
Handle requests. Janine handles the request from Marc. She reviews his document and decides to accept his request.
Logout. Janine quits for this day.
At some other day Janine logs in again.
Janine publishes all documents at once.
Janine wants to take offline a document, but is warned about documents that refer to it.
Logout. Janine quits for this day.
